name: draw lines
desc: Create both 2D and 3D lines interactively with the mouse.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Probe Action
properties.desc: Allows for the changing of the current line coordinates or for adding a new coordinates at the probed location.

properties.name: Drawing Style
properties.desc: The Drawing Style allows the user to select coordinates using two different methods.  In Top View Mode: the Viewer must be in Top View; any point in the Viewer can be selected; and the Z coordinate is the Z Top value. In Object Mode: the Viewer can be in any rotation; and only probing on objects will give coordinates.

properties.name: Z Top
properties.desc: The Z Top value is the the z value used when creating lines in Top View Mode.

properties.name: Coordinate Units
properties.desc: The coordinate units control for draw_lines has different behavior than other linked controls.  The first time a point is created the control will unlink and check the coordinate units of additional points against the set units.

properties.name: Display Lines
properties.desc: The Display Lines toggle will turn off visibility of the created lines.

properties.name: Display Glyphs
properties.desc: The Display Glyphs toggle will turn off visibility of the created glyphs.

properties.name: Line List
properties.desc: The list of lines and their coordinates created so far. Selecting the Closed toggle will cause a line segment from the last point added to the first point to be created.

properties.name: Current Line
properties.desc: The Current Line is the line selected from the Lines list.

properties.name: Generated Glyph
properties.desc: The Generated Glyph choice allows the user to select the type of glyph that is automatically generated.

properties.name: Glyph Size
properties.desc: The Glyph Size value is used to scale the glyphs in all directions. The default is automatically computed based on your input data.

properties.name: Sphere Subdivisions
properties.desc: The number of subdivisions to use for spheres. Larger numbers create more detailed sphere representations.

properties.name: Glyph Resolution
properties.desc: The resolution for generated cone, polygon, cylinder, and disk glyphs.

properties.name: Primary Axis Factor
properties.desc: The scale factor for the primary axis of the glyph.

properties.name: Secondary Axis Factor
properties.desc: The scale factor for the secondary axis of the glyph.

properties.name: Roll
properties.desc: The roll of the glyph along its primary axis.

properties.name: Alignment
properties.desc: The Alignment allows the user to choose how determine the orientation of the glyph.

properties.name: Include Center Data
properties.desc: The Include Center Data toggle will tell the module to include the center point of each glyph as a cell data component.  This allows the user to probe onto the glyph and return its center instead of the position on the outside of the glyph.
